userId.description: The user's email address. The special value `me` can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

includeSpamTrash.description: Include threads from `SPAM` and `TRASH` in the results.

labelIds.description: Only return threads with labels that match all of the specified label IDs.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of threads to return. This field defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value for this field is 500.

pageToken.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

q.description: Only return threads matching the specified query. Supports the same query format as the Gmail search box. For example, `"from:someuser@example.com rfc822msgid: is:unread"`. Parameter cannot be used when accessing the api using the gmail.metadata scope.
